soupSurface: A man walks into a bar and dies.
soupBottom: He walked into an iron bar at high speed in the dark.

soupSurface: A woman pushes her car to a hotel and realizes she's bankrupt.
A man is found dead in a room with 53 bicycles.
soupBottom: He was caught cheating at poker (53rd card), and the bicycle brand cards are common. He was killed by other players.
